reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Twinning Project for the Agency of Land Relations and Cadastre (ALRC)

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to accelerate the development of the Information Society services in Moldova in connection with the E-Governance programme; to ensure transparent governance by using and promoting information technologies in the public sector.

transaction.ref: XI-IATI-EC_NEAR-2014/350-741/FINAL PMT, CTR 2014/350741, TWINNING AGANCY OF LAND RELATIONS AND CADASTRE (ALRC).

title.narrative: Twinning Project for the Agency of Land Relations and Cadastre (ALRC)
Capacity level of the staff of the Agency for Land Relations and Cadastre (ALRC) and related institutions in the field of National Spatial Data Infrastructure (NSDI).

description.narrative: Capacity level of the staff of the Agency for Land Relations and Cadastre (ALRC) and related institutions in the field of National Spatial Data Infrastructure (NSDI).

title.narrative: Capacity level of the staff of the Agency for Land Relations and Cadastre (ALRC) and related institutions in the field of National Spatial Data Infrastructure (NSDI).

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Insufficient capacity to establish an efficient NSDI

comment.narrative: Insufficient capacity to establish an efficient NSDI

target.value: at least 100 staff of ALRC and related institutions trained

comment.narrative: at least 100 staff of ALRC and related institutions trained

actual.value: increased capacity in the field of NSDI
